review: Works fabulously!!  One of the best things I've bought!!  Games, fun for a young kid if they don't have an xbox; controller works well, certainly not a replacement for a console or pc gaming, but movies - with a prime subscription &/or purchased items - snappiest, quickest, high a/v quality, I've known!!!  Also works well with Pandora, prime music for purchased only, nice if it hosted all the prime music available for free.  Hooked up through receiver, 5.1 stereo sound - seems like I'm just beginning to tap into the Amazon movie & music resource world!!

review: Day 1 Review: excellent packaging, device looks great on my surround sound box. extremely easy to setup and start using. I have only used spotify and netflix on the device. I wish it had a native spotify app so i didn't have to open the app on my tablet first and play over WiFi. but it does play a nice screen saver on the TV while the music plays, and once its playing i can control the music with the fire TV remote. very responsive, and sound/video clarity are great.Well worth the price for what you get.
